name: Crimson Witch of Flames
description:
When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Pyro Die. (Once per Round)
Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Pyro.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

(Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Roll Phase:</color> 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be {SPRITE_PRESET#1103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>.\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)

(Once per Round)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Roll Phase:</color> 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be {SPRITE_PRESET#1103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>.\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytitle: Blazing Dissipation: Crimson Witch of Flames
storytext:
"I will sing no elegies. I refuse laments. I shall not sigh. I have no use for pointless noise.
If justice is long dead, then to whom can I offer redemption?"
